title: Dinosaur National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       A variety of ranger-led programs and special events take place from late-May through mid-October.           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 6 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Dinosaur National Monument Fossil Discovery Trail Hike      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Meet at Quarry Exhibit Hall Shuttle Stop     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/30/2016 to 09/30/2016 1.5 hour, 1.2 mile hike on a moderate trail showcasing several different rock layers View Details      Dinosaur National Monument Junior Ranger Program      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:00 AM,2:30 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Quarry Exhibit Hall     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/27/2016 to 09/04/2016 20-30 minute activity, best for kids age 5-12 View Details      Dinosaur National Monument Campground Evening Program      Time: 7:30 PM to 8:15 PM Location: Green River Campground Campfire Circle     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/30/2016 to 08/31/2016 30-45 minute talk, topics vary View Details      Dinosaur National Monument Stargazing with Telescopes      Location: Split Mountain Campground - South End     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 20-60 minute talk and telescope viewing, weather permitting. Start times vary. NOTE: A Full Moon Walk will substitute for stargazing on August 17 and 20. View Details      Dinosaur National Monument 100th Anniversary of the National Park Service      Location: Quarry Visitor Center and Canyon Visitor Center     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Cake!  View Details      Dinosaur National Monument Campground Evening Program      Time: 7:00 PM to 7:45 PM Location: Green River Campground Campfire Circle     Friday, September 2, 2016 Every Monday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 09/02/2016 to 09/10/2016 30-45 minute talk, topics vary View Details
